      • getProbStreakEnd

        private float getProbStreakEnd(int streak,
                               ResourceType focus,
                               ResourceGroupInteger[] history)
        NEW Gives the probability of a streak ending. NOTE: This is not the actual probability, but an attempt to mimic a players perception of it
        Parameters:
        streak - an int representing the current positive streak
        focus - the resource type of interest
        history - the selling/buying history
        Returns:
        probability of ending the current positive streak

      • isStreak

        private boolean isStreak(ResourceGroupInteger[] history,
                         ResourceType focus)
        NEW Returns whether the provided history is a streak for a specific type
        Parameters:
        history - selling/buying history
        focus - resource type of interest
        Returns:
        true : history is of a positive streak, false : otherwise
